News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Aldershot Town
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Aldershot Town
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Aldershot Town
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers National League home fixture against Aldersot Town Tonight.
News.description:
The Daggers will be hoping to bounce back after losing the lead in the last minute resulting in their 1-1 draw at home to Macclesfield on Saturday.

Aldershot currently sit 7th in the Vanarama National League and are on a five game unbeaten away record. Ex-Daggers Matt McClure could feature for the Shots.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 1-1 Macclesfield
Daggers 3-1 Wealdstone (FA Cup)
Eastleigh 0-1 Daggers
Torquay 1-0 Daggers
Daggers 0-0 Tranmere
 
Aldershot Town
Torquay 0-0 Aldershot
Aldershot 1-2 Eastbourne (FA Cup)
Aldershot 2-0 Solihull
Aldershot 0-4 Forest Green
York 0-1 Aldershot
 
Team News
Both Fejiri Okenabirhie and Craig Robson are doubts after taking knocks and being substituted on Saturday. New signing Scott Heard could be included in the squad. Gutteridge, Williams and Pennell still unavailable due to injury
 
Previous Meetings
The Daggers and Aldershot have met 16 times, with the Daggers winning 6 and Aldershot winning 7. The most recent meeting saw Aldershot beat Dagenham 1-0 at home.
 
National League
There is a full list of fixtures in the league on Saturday. All kick off at 7:45pm unless stated.
 
Bromley V Dover
Dagenham and Redbridge V Aldershot
Eastleigh V Torquay
Guiseley V Gateshead
Lincoln City V Boreham Wood
Macclesfield V Chester
Solihull V Forest Green
Southport V York
Sutton V Maidstone
Tranmere V North Ferriby
Woking V Braintree
Wrexham V Barrow

Tickets

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
